@IndiraFinish 很多情况下，RPC场景我们不希望超时重试，

第一：重试后很容易导致超时时间不可控。例如上游超时时间5秒，调用B服务，B调用C，如果B->C超时重试了，很容易导致A->B超时，但B->C重复。而且放大下游C负担。

第二：超时重试容易导致重复，某些写入场景下我们宁愿报错也不希望重复。

但是failover的某些特性我们还是希望保留，为了避免异常crash，网络连接不上等问题

Instead of exporting multi-group providers, just try [Tag routing rules](http://dubbo.apache.org/en-us/docs/user/demos/routing-rule.html).

By the way, It's not a good design that one RPC interface has distinct implementations in same cluster.

@IndiraFinish failover的初衷是减少单一机器调用带来的集群可用性的影响，所以如果是机器异常关闭导致的失败，只要非超时的失败，我还是希望重试。

超时通常实际的经验表明，单一机器的情况非常少（例如只有某一机器的CPU负载高），而大多数情况是意味着下游整体服务压力负载/瓶颈很大（例如访问数据库慢，调用外网服务慢），即使换机器重试也是一样超时，只会放大压力。

i clone the dubbo-samples-zookeeper, using <dubbo.version>2.7.7</dubbo.version> everything is fine,but when i switch it to 2.7.8, it shows "Exception in thread "main" java.lang.IllegalStateException: Failed to receive INITIALIZED event from zookeeper, pls. check if url zookeeper://ip:2181/org.apache.dubbo.metadata.report.MetadataReport?backup=ip1,ip2&client=&dubbo.config-center.root-path=/&timeout=10000 is correct
" what can i do to fix the problem

> i clone the dubbo-samples-zookeeper, using <dubbo.version>2.7.7</dubbo.version> everything is fine,but when i switch it to 2.7.8, it shows "Exception in thread "main" java.lang.IllegalStateException: Failed to receive INITIALIZED event from zookeeper, pls. check if url zookeeper://ip:2181/org.apache.dubbo.metadata.report.MetadataReport?backup=ip1,ip2&client=&dubbo.config-center.root-path=/&timeout=10000 is correct
> " what can i do to fix the problem

you can configure like this (modify according to your needs) :
`<dubbo:metadata-report address="zookeeper://127.0.0.1:2181?init.timeout=60000" timeout="60000"/>`
or disable metadata registration :
`<dubbo:metadata-report />`

`replaceWithLazyClient`  will be called when invoker close. This means invoker should not being invoked in the future, which cannot be reconected. Reconnect happends when the situation like network temporarily failure. If you use a registry to discover provider, when provider restart, a new invoker will be created.

dubbo:

```

正常情况，consumer从注册中心获取provider指定的序列化协议，provider根据header中额protoId去查ID_SERIALIZATION_MAP获取相应的Serialization，不会出现不一致。

I'm also confuse about the dubbo:parameter , it doesn't seem to work,
sometimes we don't want to use RpcContext explicitly, but want to configure extra-param through a configuration file.

> I'm also confuse about the dubbo:parameter , it doesn't seem to work,
> sometimes we don't want to use RpcContext explicitly, but want to configure extra-param through a configuration file.

Like @DIscord010  said `<dubbo:parameter>` is a parameter configuration, which is used by Dubbo to config RPC properties. It is the same like `retries` properties in `<dubbo:reference>`. The only way to pass implicit parameters is using `RpcContext.getContext().setAttachment`.

> > I'm also confuse about the dubbo:parameter , it doesn't seem to work,
> > sometimes we don't want to use RpcContext explicitly, but want to configure extra-param through a configuration file.
> 
> Like @DIscord010 said `<dubbo:parameter>` is a parameter configuration, which is used by Dubbo to config RPC properties. It is the same like `retries` properties in `<dubbo:reference>`. The only way to pass implicit parameters is using `RpcContext.getContext().setAttachment`.

upgrade to jackson2 as following works fine for me. exclude jackson firstly:
`
            <dependency>

                <groupId>org.apache.dubbo</groupId>

                <artifactId>dubbo-rpc-rest</artifactId>

                <version>${dubbo.rpc.version}</version>

                <exclusions>

                    <exclusion>

                        <groupId>org.jboss.resteasy</groupId>

                        <artifactId>resteasy-jackson-provider</artifactId>

                    </exclusion>

                </exclusions>

            </dependency>
`
add jackson2 then:
`
            <dependency>

                <groupId>org.jboss.resteasy</groupId>

                <artifactId>resteasy-jackson2-provider</artifactId>

                <version>${resteasy.version}</version>

            </dependency>
`

经过上述5步操作后，第5步操作总是异常，查看了一下源码：
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13184705/91326209-a4bc5b00-e7f6-11ea-950e-e1a5b9c18b8e.png)
invoker在init时被标记为destroy，故第5步的服务调用总是失败
我也遇到了，最后解决了吗？

> 我也遇到了，最后解决了吗？

解决了，不是dubbo的问题，是我们运行环境有java agent程序修改了invoke后的信息。

> 我们也遇到过，这种奇怪的现象曾经也怀疑过各种 IO情况，但最后定位是线程池不足，请求压根无法进入dubbo线程池，dubbo框架也没有打印异常，当然请求入参出参也没打印，客户的表现就是超时。

“最后定位是线程池不足”，这个是否是在服务端的日志中发现了Thread pool is EXHAUSTED! 故障呢？

@AlbumenJ It seems dubbo rewrite method implement for fix this.I'll try later, thanks.
@zhvqee Thanks
